message: Hello buyer, this is a great product that I think you'll really love. Unfortunately I do not have statistics yet, but I assure you I am a trusted seller.

Thanks for the recommendation, Alice. However, without any past sales data to back up your claims, I'm hesitant to take the risk. I'll pass on this one, but I'm interested to see how your future sales go. Let me know if you have any other products with more data available.
